SnapshotOraclev11g.name: mv_std_fourth_sub
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery: SELECT school_code, batch_no#, class_code, stream_code, term_code, student_id, super_code, ranking_type, category_code, optional_type, compulsory_type, part_name, fourth_type FROM ( SELECT csub.school_code, csub.batch_no#, csub.class_code, csub.stream_code, csub.term_code, ssub.student_id, ssubj.super_code, 'NO' AS ranking_type, '0008' AS category_code, ssup.optional_type, ssup.compulsory_type, ssup.fourth_type, decode(ssup.part_name, 'I', decode(2, 2, 'II'), 'II', decode(3, 3, 'III')) AS part_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY csub.school_code, csub.batch_no#, csub.class_code, csub.stream_code, ssub.student_id, csub.term_code ORDER BY CASE WHEN ssup.fourth_type = 'Y' THEN round(SUM(csub.ratio_ant / csub.ratio_con * nvl(sa.score, 0) * salloc.max_mark / nvl(sa.maxmark, 1))) ELSE 9999 END ASC, ssub.fourth_subject DESC ) AS score_row FROM class_subject csub INNER JOIN school_subject ssubj ON ( ssubj.school_code = csub.school_code AND ssubj.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND ssubj.class_code = csub.class_code AND ssubj.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND ssubj.subject_code = csub.subject_code ) INNER JOIN school_super ssup ON ( ssup.school_code = csub.school_code AND ssup.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND ssup.class_code = csub.class_code AND ssup.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND ssup.super_code = ssubj.super_code ) INNER JOIN std_score_alloc salloc ON ( salloc.school_code = csub.school_code AND salloc.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND salloc.class_code = csub.class_code AND salloc.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND salloc.term_code = csub.term_code AND salloc.super_code = ssubj.super_code ) INNER JOIN std_subject ssub ON ( ssub.school_code = csub.school_code AND ssub.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND ssub.class_code = csub.class_code AND ssub.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND ssub.term_code = csub.term_code AND ssub.student_id = salloc.student_id AND ssub.subject_code = csub.subject_code ) LEFT OUTER JOIN mv_std_assessment sa ON ( sa.school_code = csub.school_code AND sa.batch_no# = csub.batch_no# AND sa.class_code = csub.class_code AND sa.stream_code = csub.stream_code AND sa.term_code = csub.term_code AND sa.subject_code = csub.subject_code AND sa.evaluation_code = salloc.evaluation_code AND sa.student_id = salloc.student_id ) WHERE csub.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND ssubj.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND ssup.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND ssub.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND salloc.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND ssup.ranking_type = 'YES' AND ssup.fourth_type = 'Y' GROUP BY csub.school_code, csub.batch_no#, csub.class_code, csub.stream_code, csub.term_code, ssub.student_id, ssubj.super_code, 'NO', '0008', ssup.optional_type, ssup.compulsory_type, ssup.part_name, ssub.fourth_subject, ssup.fourth_type ORDER BY school_code, batch_no#, class_code, stream_code, term_code, student_id, score_row DESC ) WHERE score_row > 3
